docs.title: About Me
docs.text: Hi, I'm Richard. I am a very avid writer, creating multiple documents and producing hundreds of lines (of code) daily. In terms of literature, I don't really explore creative writing on my own time. However, I do regularly utilize technical writing and academic writing across a small variety of topics.

docs.title: Work
docs.text: This section exhibits the various essays and assignments that I have produced throughout the year. This section is organized in chronological order, with earliest writings at the start of this year at the top, and latest writings at the bottom.

docs.title: Their Eyes Were Watching God Close Reading - Analytical Writing
